answers.answer: Good luck,  hope everything turns out ok!
What sparked their concern? Did you have high BP? What were the symptoms you were having to make them think that?
i hope everything turns out great for you :)she may have to much protein in her urine, swollen feet maybe water retension i think is a symptom hence the swollen feet legs face hands

Well I've had high blood pressure since I got pregnant so I've been on medicine but I was feeling bad yesterday dizzy nauseous and headache my bp was high when I went into my doc I got sent to labor and delivery stayed for 8 hrs and then was put on 24hr observeration and yes protein in urine liver ans white blood cells were high

Yep sounds like Preeclampsia. Not trying to scare you but I had it and almost died (do did my baby) with my first. He was born at 36 weeks because my kidneys were failing and he was in distress so if that's for sure what you've got LISTEN and follow ALL of the Drs instructions!!

Well my blood pressure seems to go up and down my doc said like its trying to get up there but isn't staying but still bad headache dizzy and dots what do u think do u think I have developed preclampsia

Well my blood pressure seems to go up and down my doc said like its trying to get up there but isn't staying but still bad headache dizzy and dots what do u think do u think I have developed preclampsia

question: I have been put in the hospital for 24hr observation to see if im developing pre eclampsia the baby is healthy and doing amazing they are just worried about me. I will update as I know anything ill be in here till 7or8tonight thanks for reading
title: not a question just letting everyone know
